_sText:
a bowling alley indoor and outdoor

changes in v2:


fixed entities to start asleep (fixing lag problem)

made door only open one way out in the hallway so that you cant block them as human

removed the door to the upper floor and made the hole a little bigger

fixed some textures on the stairs to the basement

fixed a leak in the level (no error messages in console)


please download and leave feedback :D and assesments^^


changes in v3

you asked for it so now there is 3 ways into the attic ^^

added cubemaps to the level

changed some textures here and there and deleted some props here and there

added a couple of decals here ands there
